inkscape-extension.name: Update inkstitch svg
inkscape-extension.label: Usually there is no need to run this extension: Ink/Stitch automatically updates old designs once.
However, when you copy and paste parts from old files into a new design, you may see for example, that a former contour fill renders as a standard fill, etc.

Tip: You can prevent inserting legacy designs into new files by running any Ink/Stitch extension before you copy the design parts (for example open and re-apply parameters on a single element in the document).
This extension only updates selected elements.
